body_html: @ibab It does seem like it has to be transpose + reshape + stuff + reshape + transpose. I don't think a custom tf.reshape_selected makes sense: separate transpose and reshape is cleaner especially since you have to invert it. The tf.cond is indeed necessary in general. This is getting ugly, but I don't know a cleaner way.
body_text: @ibab It does seem like it has to be transpose + reshape + stuff + reshape + transpose.  I don't think a custom tf.reshape_selected makes sense: separate transpose and reshape is cleaner especially since you have to invert it.  The tf.cond is indeed necessary in general.  This is getting ugly, but I don't know a cleaner way.
body: @ibab It does seem like it has to be transpose + reshape + stuff + reshape + transpose.  I don't think a custom `tf.reshape_selected` makes sense: separate `transpose` and `reshape` is cleaner especially since you have to invert it.  The `tf.cond` is indeed necessary in general.  This is getting ugly, but I don't know a cleaner way.
